TestCase.Title: Test case EID_CLIENT_A1_03
TestCase.Purpose: The test case for verifying the behavior of the eID-Client if the activation message is malformed, i. e. the TC Token URL is missing.

TestStep.Description: Note that the activation message is malformed, due to missing TC Token URL.

ExpectedResult.Text: The eID-Client reports a communication error. It returns an error "Bad Request" or "Not Found" to the browser. In case of a web server based Client-Interface, the HTTP error code is "400 Bad Request" or "404 Not Found".
